Open the VLC application to access its media playback and management features.
Click on "Internal memory" under the "Storages" section to access the files within the internal storage.
Click on the "VLCVideos" folder to view its contents.
Click on the video file "ioBB_scene_16_raw.mp4" to open it in the video player.
Click "Got it" to dismiss the "Viewing full screen" tip.
